Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIc bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: digestion products of circularin A are not the cause of the residual antibacterial activity

Literature.Title: Identification and characterization of two novel clostridial bacteriocins, circularin A and closticin 574.
Literature.Author: Kemperman R, Kuipers A, Karsens H, Nauta A, Kuipers O, Kok J.

Literature.Title: Functional analysis of the gene cluster involved in production of the bacteriocin circularin A by Clostridium beijerinckii ATCC 25752.
Literature.Author: Kemperman R, Jonker M, Nauta A, Kuipers OP, Kok J.
